name: date-operations
description: Accurate date calculations with personal timezone and bank holiday support for global teams
long_description:
This extension provides reliable working day calculations, sprint planning tools, and Asana due date formatting with support for 14 countries across The Access Group's global offices.

**Key Features:**
- Working day calculations (excludes weekends and your local bank holidays)
- Personal timezone support (14 countries supported)
- Asana due date formatting (configurable time)
- Sprint planning and current sprint calculations
- Bank holiday checking from official sources

**Supported Countries:**
UK, Romania, Spain, Ireland, Denmark, Germany, Poland, USA, New Zealand, Australia, Malaysia, Sri Lanka, Thailand, Vietnam

**Perfect for:**
- Business Analysts managing user stories and sprints
- Project managers calculating deadlines
- Global teams needing personal working day context
- Anyone who needs reliable date arithmetic with local holidays
